My Work

Bike Garage

Bike-Garage is a full stack web app, built on a REST API, for uploading and displaying bikes to a garage on a Vue + Bulma frontend.
Node.js, MongoDB, Vue.js, Express

Project Github

Race Pace

Race Pace allows the user to get their average pace, duration, or distance of a running race.
JavaScript

Kana Quiz is a game for practicing Japanese hiragana and katakana.
